languages.text: "Вил'Маражая должно было убить. Но не так. Не на потеху ксеносам, не по их правилам".
"It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."
languages.original_text: "Вил'Маражая должно было убить. Но не так. Не на потеху ксеносам, не по их правилам".

traits.locale_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."
"It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."
"It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."
"It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."
"It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

languages.text: "Es war richtig, dass Vil'Marazhai getötet wird. Aber nicht so. Nicht zur Belustigung der Xenos, und nicht nach ihren Regeln."
languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

traits.locale_text: "Es war richtig, dass Vil'Marazhai getötet wird. Aber nicht so. Nicht zur Belustigung der Xenos, und nicht nach ihren Regeln."

languages.text: « C'est une bonne chose que Vil'Marazhaï ait été tué, mais il n'aurait pas dû mourir ainsi, selon les règles des xénos et pour leur plus grand plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une bonne chose que Vil'Marazhaï ait été tué, mais il n'aurait pas dû mourir ainsi, selon les règles des xénos et pour leur plus grand plaisir. »

languages.text: «Es justo que Vil'Marazhai muriera, pero no así. No por diversión de los xenos y no según sus reglas».
languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

traits.locale_text: «Es justo que Vil'Marazhai muriera, pero no así. No por diversión de los xenos y no según sus reglas».

languages.text: 「マラズハイが殺されたというのは本当だったのね。でも、このようにではないわ。異種族の娯楽のためでもなければ、彼らのルールに従っていたわけでもない」
languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイが殺されたというのは本当だったのね。でも、このようにではないわ。異種族の娯楽のためでもなければ、彼らのルールに従っていたわけでもない」

languages.text: “敌者玛拉斋确实该死，但不该这么死。不该为了取悦异形而死，也不该遵守他们的规则而死。”
languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

traits.locale_text: “敌者玛拉斋确实该死，但不该这么死。不该为了取悦异形而死，也不该遵守他们的规则而死。”

languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."

languages.text: "Vil'Marazhai'ın öldürülmesi doğru olsa da bu şekilde zenoları eğlendirerek, onların kurallarına göre oynayarak yaşanmamalıydı."
languages.original_text: "It was right that Vil'Marazhai was killed. But not like this. Not for the amusement of the xenos, and not according to their rules."
